text:
with a running Tomcat 3.3-beta 1 server, point your browser to:

http://localhost:8080/examples

and go to JSP examples

and execute "Snoop"

you'll see 127.0.0.1 as the Remote Address, instead of your local IP address.

this function worked fine in Tomcat 3.2.3.

this function is also heavily used in JSP's.

(our application uses the IP address to store client applet settings on the 
server)
creator: cvernon@enron.com
